      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildCity()
      Send the command to the server proxy to build a city on the board.

      Send the command to the server proxy to build a road on the board.

      Send the command to the server proxy to build a settlement on the board.
      void buyDevCard()
      Send the command to the server proxy to build a settlement on the board.
      boolean canBuildCity()
      Checks with the model to see if it's the player's turn, if they have the resources to build a city or not, and if they've chosen a valid place to put the city.
      boolean canBuildRoad()
      Checks with the model to see if it's the player's turn, if they have the resources to build a road or not, and if they've chosen a valid place to put the road.
      boolean canBuildSettlement()
      Checks with the model to see if it's the player's turn, if they have the resources to build a settlement or not, and if they've chosen a valid place to put the settlement.
      boolean canBuyDevCard()
      Checks with the model to see if it's the player's turn and if they have the resources to buy a development card or not.
      boolean canRollDice()
      Checks with the model to see if it's the player's turn and if they are able to roll the dice.
      void createPlayer()
      This function will facilitate the creation of a user.
      void finishTurn()
      Send the end turn command to the server proxy.
      boolean isTurn()
      This function will query the model to make sure it's the user's turn before they can do anything.
      void login(Credentials credentials)
      This function will interface with the server proxy in order to log a player into the server.
      void offerTrade()
      Send the command to the server proxy to offer a trade with another player.
      void playDevCard()
      Send the command to the server proxy to play a development card.
      void rollDice()
      If it's the beginning of the user's turn, they can roll the dice.
      void sendChat()
      Send a message to the server proxy in order to deliver it to another player.
      void tradeFour()
      Send the command to the server proxy to trade in four of a kind for another resource
      void tradeHarbor()
      Send the command to the server proxy to trade with an adjoining harbor

    • Method Detail

      • createPlayer

        public void createPlayer()
        This function will facilitate the creation of a user. The ClientFacade class will interface with the server proxy to communicate with the server and create the user.

      • login

        public void login(Credentials credentials)
        This function will interface with the server proxy in order to log a player into the server.

      • isTurn

        public boolean isTurn()
        This function will query the model to make sure it's the user's turn before they can do anything.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it's the player's turn, otherwise, returns false;

      • canRollDice

        public boolean canRollDice()
        Checks with the model to see if it's the player's turn and if they are able to roll the dice.
        Returns:
        returns true if they can, false if they can't

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice()
        If it's the beginning of the user's turn, they can roll the dice. First, check if the user can roll. Then, interface with the server proxy to send the command.
        Throws:

      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad()
        Checks with the model to see if it's the player's turn, if they have the resources to build a road or not, and if they've chosen a valid place to put the road.
        Returns:
        returns true if they can, false if they can't.

      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad()
        Send the command to the server proxy to build a road on the board.
